languages.text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы замечаете неправильность в облике бродяги, а именно — в его обуви. Смущает вас не сам факт ношения им ботинок, а то, что ботинки эти — ваши.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Присмотревшись, вы замечаете неправильность в облике бродяги, а именно — в его обуви. Смущает вас не сам факт ношения им ботинок, а то, что ботинки эти — ваши.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As you take a better look at the vagabond, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance — namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, it is the indisputable fact that those boots are yours.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the vagabond, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance — namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, it is the indisputable fact that those boots are yours.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye. It is the indisputable fact that those boots are yours.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye. It is the indisputable fact that those boots are yours.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

{n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乞食をよく見てみると、彼の他の外見とは相容れない部分があることに気づく。ブーツだ。目を引いたのはそれを履いている彼ではなく、そのブーツがあなたのものだという紛れもない事実である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食をよく見てみると、彼の他の外見とは相容れない部分があることに気づく。ブーツだ。目を引いたのはそれを履いている彼ではなく、そのブーツがあなたのものだという紛れもない事実である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你仔细观察眼前的乞丐时，你注意到，他的靴子与他肮脏的外表格格不入。这并不是说如此衣衫褴褛的乞丐怎么会有靴子穿，而是——那双靴子是你的，毫无疑问。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你仔细观察眼前的乞丐时，你注意到，他的靴子与他肮脏的外表格格不入。这并不是说如此衣衫褴褛的乞丐怎么会有靴子穿，而是——那双靴子是你的，毫无疑问。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Al observar mejor al mendigo te fijas en cierto detalle que desentona con el resto de su aspecto, sus botas. No es que lleve botas lo que te llama la atención, sino el hecho indiscutible de que esas botas son tuyas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Al observar mejor al mendigo te fijas en cierto detalle que desentona con el resto de su aspecto, sus botas. No es que lleve botas lo que te llama la atención, sino el hecho indiscutible de que esas botas son tuyas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du den Bettler näher betrachtest, bemerkst du ein Detail, das im Kontrast zu seinem restlichen Erscheinungsbild steht: seine Stiefel. Entscheidend ist allerdings nicht, dass er Stiefel trägt, sondern dass es ganz eindeutig deine Stiefel sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dir den Bettler näher besiehst, bemerkst du ein Detail, das im Kontrast zu seinem restlichen Erscheinungsbild steht: seine Stiefel. Aber nicht die Tatsache, dass er Stiefel trägt, springt dir ins Auge. Sondern die nicht zu leugnende Tatsache, dass es deine Stiefel sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alors que vous observez le mendiant avec un peu plus d'attention, vous remarquez un détail surprenant qui détone avec le reste de son apparence : ses bottes. Ce n'est pas tant le fait qu'il en porte qui vous interpelle, mais plutôt le fait que ce sont les vôtres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que vous observez le mendiant avec un peu plus d'attention, vous remarquez un détail surprenant qui détone avec le reste de son apparence : ses bottes. Ce n'est pas tant le fait qu'il en porte qui vous interpelle. Mais plutôt le fait que ce sont les vôtres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dilenciye alıcı gözle bakınca giysilerine uymayan botları dikkatini çekiyor. Gözüne takılan şeyse bot giyiyor olması değil, o botların kesinlikle senin olduğu gerçeği.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you take a better look at the beggar, you notice a certain detail that is at odds with the rest of his appearance, namely, his boots. It is not him wearing boots that catches your eye, but the indisputable fact that they are your boots.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenciye alıcı gözle bakınca geri kalanına uymayan bir detay olan botları dikkatini çekiyor. Gözüne takılan şey,bot giyiyor olması değil o botların kesinlikle senin olduğu gerçeği.{/n}
